BREAKING: ELON MUSK LIKES TWEET SAYING $TSLA PIVOTING TO AUTONOMY WILL CREATE VALUE “UNLIKE ANYTHING THE WORLD HAS SEEN” 👀

The time has come for Tesla stock to make a comeback! https://t.co/r1wnS0MxwW

$UBER CEO Dara Khosrowshahi’s comments on $TSLA and autonomy:
1/ AV technology will be very good for the ride-hailing industry since it will reduce costs and increase adoption.
2/ AV technology will take a long time to develop - partly due to the regulatory framework required but also the tech itself can’t make a jump from human drivers fully to AV.
3/ Uber looking to partner with the AV industry and can bring a lot to the table - routing algorithms, pricing matching, payment systems. 
4/ $TSLA FSD looks like a great product.
